basic.description:
An introduction, overview and synthesis of current coaching theory which provides the basis of sound, ethical and effective coaching practices.
LEARNING HOURS    108 (36L;72P)
RECOMMENDATION    KNPE 237/3.0 or PPHE 237/3.0.
basic.subject: KNPE
basic.title: The Art and Science of Coaching

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     Level 2 or above in a PHED or KINE Plan and KNPE265
